physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 9 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#1166 Silver Tire Company and Sam Silver.'' On back of photograph: ''Sam Silver front center. January, 1925 class at Cheltenham.'' On front of photograph: ''January Class of 1925, Cheltenham School, Denver, [illegible] Alex Martin, photographer.''

mods.abstract: Students and their teachers pose for a school photo on steps of the Cheltenham School. Sam Silver sits fifth from the right in the front row with an arrow pointing to him.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
